comments.content:
That's Eduardo Recife's [Porcelain](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525000837/http:/www.dafont.com/search.php?nq=1&q=Porcelain) from [Misprinted Type](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525000837/http:/www.misprintedtype.com/). And they have a commercial version called [Nars](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525000837/http:/www.misprintedtype.com/type/type_nars.html), which I think is really nice and grungy.   
   
Other grungy looking scripts which I like include Article, Solace from [Lunchbox Studios](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525000837/http:/www.lunchboxstudios.com/).
